column5: This home is a 2 story Log Home situated on 8 private acres and adjacent to open pastures. Conveniently located between Glen Rose and Granbury. Just 8 min to the Marina at Lake Granbury, about 20 min to Fossil Rim Wildlife Park and Dinosaur Valley and about 10 min to the historic town of Glen Rose . We are also very close to the Squaw Valley golf course, fishing and the rodeo in Glen Rose. There is lots of great dining and shopping in the nearby towns and the house is great for family meals.
